translation: Who and how is Adhiyajna here in this body, O destroyer of Madhu? And how, at the time of death, are You to be known by the self-controlled?
commentary: 8.2 Adhiyajna Adhiyajna? How how? Who who? Here here? Dehe in body? In this this? Madhusudana Or Madhusudana? Prayanakale at the time of death? f and? How how? Knowable knowable? Are you art? Niyatātmabhiḥ by the selfcontrolled.Commentary Arjuna put seven estions to the Lord1. What is that Brahman Is it Brahman with the Upadhis (limiting adjuncts) or Brahman without them2. Is it the aggregate of the senses or individual
